D_Victim.Dialogue: Hello Officer! I have just been robbed!
I had just finished withdrawing money from the ATM, and then a person came and took my wallet!
We fought, and he hit me in the head!
Unfortunately, I can't remember what the person looked like...
No problem, I see we have a surveillance camera there. I will see what I can do.
Dispatch, can you give me access to the CCTV at my current location?

D_Suspect.Dialogue: What's your problem? Why are you following me?
You match the description of a recent robbery that has taken place.
Do I look like a criminal? That's ridiculous.
You have the wrong person, I didn't do anything!

General.CalloutAdvisory: A person has reported being robbed right after withdrawing money
General.Text: You should now have access to the camera.
Press {0} to view the camera feed!
We have reports of another robbery; the ~y~area is marked~s~ on your GPS.
The suspect doesn't seem to care.
